rules_text:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: If Omnifrequency Authority isn't onstage it takes the stage. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
As long as you control two or more legendary creature and/or planeswalkers, you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
